Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "When you open your eyes, you do not find your trusty ol' ceiling greeting you. Instead, all you see is darkness."}
{3: 'You cannot remember a single thing. You only know that you cannot move even an inch.'}
{3: 'It is a closed, dark, and narrow compartment. You try to lift your hands, but all you can feel is the cold metal interior.'}
{3: '...Where is this place? Is this the inside of some device?'}
{3: 'You feel strong mind signals nearby.'}
{3: 'But no signs or requests of connection.'}
{3: 'Lucia, Liv, Lee...'}
{2: '(Try to break free)', 3: '12', 4: '(Try to call for help)', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "I suggest you stop doing that. You don't want to bump your head now, do you?"}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Scream all you want, only we can hear them here.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Ah, your next line is... "Who are you people?"'}
{2: 'Male Voice', 3: "Hey! You're spoiling the fun!"}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Noctis, you are such an annoying tart.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "I don't plan to keep this a secret, but still, it would be too much of a spoiler to reveal it now."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Anyway, I'm about to start a game with our dear Commandant here. 21, take Noctis to another mission location."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Alright. Let's go, Noctis."}
{2: 'Male Voice', 3: "You didn't even try to hide my name!"}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "It's not like the one in the connection chamber knows who you are anyway. I'll count to three, and you'd better be outta my sight by then. Do you understand?"}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'And... three.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Where's one and two?!"}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Let's get going, Noctis."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tsk.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Good, now that we finally have some peace and quiet to ourselves—Where were we just now?'}
{2: "What's a connection chamber?", 3: '31', 4: 'The game.', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'The connection chamber is a very important item for this game. Let me explain in detail.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Right. I want to play a game. Using the connection chamber.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: '"Elite" squads, like Gray Raven, are driven by their commandants.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Synchronized combat tactics rely on Constructs connecting to the Mind Beacon of a nearby commandant via their Inver-Devices. Yes?'}

{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Limited by the working distance of a Mind Beacon, a commandant would have to be physically present in battle despite their fragile human bodies. They risk being infected at all time...'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "But this wasn't how commandants and Constructs worked together in the past."}

{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Commandants once used connection chambers to amplify their signal, and coupled with an Inver-Device, commandants can remotely connect to the M.I.N.D. of Constructs and synchronize with them.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Once connected, the minds of commandants and Constructs will be synchronized, sharing their feelings and vision. It's pretty much two-as-one."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Such connection allows commandants to make the most accurate decisions and ensures the perfect execution of any order.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "No longer limited by distance or space... It also significantly reduces a commandant's risk of infection. Impressive, isn't it?"}
{2: 'Why is it discontinued then?', 3: '43', 4: 'Impressive indeed.', 5: '44'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Because all the damage taken by the connected Construct will be reflected to the commandant's mind... That's the price of synchronization."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Too bad this great invention was then banned because it could potentially break a commandant's mind. What a shame."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Anyway, that's enough said. Let's begin."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'I will connect you to different Constructs. You will need to control them to rescue yourself.'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Oh, right, I'll also set a timer. If you are still not rescued at the end, I'll toss you and the chamber into the Arctic Ocean."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: 'Are you clear about the rules, my "Sleeping Beauty"?'}
{2: 'What are you trying to do?', 3: '50', 4: "...This isn't an April Fool's prank, is it?", 5: '51'}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "It's April Fool's! My favorite."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "I do want to give you an April Fool's that you won't forget, but just to make things clear—this isn't a joke."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Well then, before the game starts, here's a timely greeting for you."}
{2: 'Female Voice', 3: "Happy April Fool's Day, Gray Raven Commandant."}
